review:
Angels come in all sizes and shapes, colors, visible and invisible to the human eye. But always you are changed from having seen one. Such is the case with me and I found my angel in Dr. Shalini Chawla Khanna.
It was our 4th year of marriage and like any other couple we too had to undergo the usual concerns shared by parents, relatives and even neighbours on having a baby. I had a miscarriage in the first year and since then i wasn't able to conceive. Had visited several gynecologists (good ones) as suggested by family and friends but nothing worked out as no one could diagnose well and the related treatment was out of question . Dr. Shalini Chawla Khanna came into our lives when we had lost all hopes of becoming parents. She listened to all our concerns patiently by giving us all the time and addressed them all very well. She even explains the treatment and procedure recommended very well before going forward with it. I was diagnosed with multiple fibroids in my uterus and underwent laparoscopy myomectomy successfully under her treatment. Dr. Shalini Chawla Khanna is always avaliable on calls/whatsapp chats/messages. She doesn't put you in unnecessary medications nor will make you undergo unnecessary tests or visits. I had my complete trust in her and went with the suggested treatments which not only was the right one for me but also brought our dream of becoming parents a reality. Soooooooo Happy to announce the arrival of our little bundle of joy this October 2022. *** ******* ****** ****** ** *** **** ************* *********** *********** *** ********** *** ************ ******** I will always always recommend her. With all my heart I wish Dr. Shalini Chawla Khanna all the success and happiness in her life.
